outputs.output_descr:
Initiation Plan (Aug 2010 - Dec 2011)
Output 1 - Governments and other stakeholders' national priorities for use of the Guiana Shield Facility (GSF), and perspectives on the governance structure for the GSF documented.
Output 2 - GSF's detailed operational guideline prepared, and GSF set up and promoted as a sustainable financial vehicle for conservation and sustainable development of the eco-region
Output 3 - GSF project document for the long-term conservation and sustainable development of the eco-region finalised and signed by the governments of at least three Guiana Shield countries.

Project Implementation (Jan 2012 - Dec 2014)

OUTPUT 1 - GSF established as a long-term forum and vehicle to address national and regional environmental issues related to management of ES of the GS eco-region.

OUTPUT 2 - GSF maintained as a sustainable financial vehicle for conservation and sustainable development of the GS eco-region and its ES.

OUTPUT 3 - Exchange of knowledge and capacity building to enhance the conservation and sustainable development of the GS eco-region.

project_descr: GSF promoted as a sustainable financial vehicle for the conservation and sustainable development of the Guiana Shield ecoregion.
